android.permission.INTERNET: Allows the app to access the internet.
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Allows the app to access information about networks.
android.permission.READ_CONTACTS: Allows the app to read user contacts.
android.permission.CAMERA: Allows the app to access the device's camera.
com.example.app.MainActivity: Main entry point of the app.
com.example.app.provider.MyProvider: Content provider for sharing data with other apps.
